name: get_person_by_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool auther_check.
Tool description: Plug and play the facial authentication into: point of sale, mobile app, self-checkouts, kiosk, ATM.
API description: To check if the person_id already exists in the system, just specify the path with person_id. If the person_id exists in response you will get the same person_id and information when a person was created and updated.

person_id.description: The unique identifier of the person whose information is to be retrieved.
